thread.title: Tom Bychowski ILLINOIS CONTRACT GLAZING INC
thread.title_full: SJF Material Handling Inc. reviewed by Tom Bychowski ILLINOIS CONTRACT GLAZING INC

author: Tom Bychowski ILLINOIS CONTRACT GLAZING INC
title: Tom Bychowski ILLINOIS CONTRACT GLAZING INC
text: ORDERED MATERIAL ON OCTOBER 31 AND WAS TOLD APPROXIMATE THREE WEEK TURN AROUND ON THE THE ORDER BY ERIC THOVSON. I RECEIVED NO E-MAIL OR PHONE CALL ABOUT ANY DELAY I HAD A LARGE PROJECT COMING IN MID DECEMBER THAT I NEEDED THE STORAGE FOR . I CALLED AND WAS INFORMED THE ORDER WAS DELAYED AND WAS DUE IN ON DECEMBER 9TH . THIS DID NOT HAPPEN SO I HAD TO GO ELSE WHERE TO STORE MATERIAL. I RECEIVED THE ORDER THE THIRD WEEK OF JANUARY. ONLY IF I WOULD OF BEEN INFORMED IN THE BEGINNING WOULD I THINK ABOUT MAKING ANOTHER PURCHASE FROM SJF. VERY VERY POOR SERVICE.
